solution_line_template: During the race, there were five ads, lasting {duration_per_ad} minutes each, so in total, they lasted {num_advertisements} * {duration_per_ad} = <<{num_advertisements}*{duration_per_ad}={total_duration_minutes}>>{total_duration_minutes} minutes.
So the total cost of these ads was {total_duration_minutes} * {cost_per_minute} = $<<{total_duration_minutes}*{cost_per_minute}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
